trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event occurs when code executing by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> throws an exception which is not handled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento si verifica quando il codice in esecuzione tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>genera un'eccezione che non è gestita.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento fornisce un mezzo per non generare la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento viene generato in primo luogo e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>il DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs è impostata su `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>non verrà generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was raised when executing code by way of the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'eccezione generata durante l'esecuzione di codice tramite il dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the exception should be caught and the event handlers called.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se l'eccezione deve essere rilevata e i gestori eventi chiamati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento fornisce un mezzo per non generare la <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> is raised first, and If RequestCatch on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>viene generato per primo e se RequestCatch sul <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs>è impostata su `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>non verrà generato l'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: A previous handler in the event multicast might have already set this property to `false`, indicating that the exception will not be caught.
trans-unit.target: Un gestore precedente nell'evento multicast potrà avere già impostato questa proprietà `false`, che indica che l'eccezione non sarà rilevata.

trans-unit.source: The "don't catch" behavior will override all others because it most likely means a debugging scenario.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento di "non si rilevano" sostituiranno tutte le altre perché implica molto probabilmente uno scenario di debug.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"></xref> should be raised; otherwise; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"> </xref> deve essere generato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
